fields.value: Supporting Data for: Data sharing in public health emergencies: A study of current policies, practices and infrastructure supporting the sharing of data to prevent and respond to epidemic and pandemic threats.

dsDescriptionValue.value:
Grouped here are the data referred to in the study: 
Data sharing in public health emergencies - A study of current policies, practices and infrastructure supporting the sharing of data to prevent and respond to epidemic and pandemic threats. The study was commissioned by the Wellcome Trust on behalf of the Data Sharing Working Group of the GloPID-R research funding consortium.

fields.value: Comments on these materials are very welcome. Please send to pisani AT ternyata DOT org.
